short_description: Real-time people analytics product using computer vision and NVIDIA DeepStream, optimized for edge devices. Deployed at Sankara Hospital, Coimbatore, delivering actionable insights for smart surveillance, crowd management, and operational optimization.
brief_description:
Description:
A fully developed product for real-time people analytics using computer vision and NVIDIA DeepStream. The system is optimized for edge devices, enabling scalable and efficient deployment in resource-constrained environments. Currently deployed at Sankara Hospital, Coimbatore.

Key Contributions:

- Designed a robust pipeline for multi-stream video processing and real-time analytics.
- Integrated automated logging and reporting for insights such as crowd patterns and occupancy trends.
- Optimized for low-latency performance, ensuring smooth operation on edge-based deployments (Jetson Orin Nano, Jetson AGX Orin, Jetson Thor series, etc.).

Impact:

- Provides organizations with actionable insights for crowd management, retail analytics, and smart surveillance.
- Reduces reliance on manual monitoring while increasing operational efficiency.
- Flexible design allows deployment from small-scale edge devices to larger centralized systems.

short_description: A real-time people counting solution powered by computer vision and NVIDIA DeepStream, optimized for edge devices. Deployed at CODISSIA, Coimbatore, it delivers automated headcounts and occupancy insights to enhance smart surveillance and facility management.
brief_description:
Description:
A real-time people counting product leveraging computer vision and NVIDIA DeepStream, specifically designed for edge device optimization. The system ensures scalable, efficient, and accurate occupancy monitoring in diverse environments. Currently deployed at CODISSIA, Coimbatore.

Key Contributions:

- Built a robust computer vision pipeline for precise people counting across multiple camera streams.
- Enabled automated collection, logging, and reporting of occupancy data, including entry/exit counts and real-time occupancy trends.
- Optimized system performance for low-latency execution on NVIDIA Jetson platforms (Orin Nano, AGX Orin, Thor series, etc.).

Impact:

- Empowers organizations with actionable insights for smart surveillance, facility management, and retail analytics.
- Minimizes the need for manual monitoring while boosting accuracy and operational efficiency.
- Offers flexible deployment ranging from small-scale single-camera setups to enterprise-grade multi-camera networks.

topic: Real-time Vehicle Counting and Monitoring System
short_description: Real-time vehicle counting and monitoring solution using computer vision and NVIDIA DeepStream, optimized for edge devices. Delivers automated traffic insights and occupancy monitoring for smart transportation management.
brief_description:
Description:
A fully developed real-time vehicle counting and monitoring product leveraging computer vision and NVIDIA DeepStream. The system is optimized for edge devices, enabling scalable, low-latency traffic monitoring in diverse environments.

Key Contributions:

- Built a robust pipeline for multi-stream vehicle detection and counting in real-time.
- Implemented automated logging and reporting for metrics such as traffic density, vehicle flow, and occupancy patterns.
- Optimized system performance for edge deployment on NVIDIA Jetson platforms (Orin Nano, AGX Orin, Thor series, etc.).

Impact:

- Provides actionable insights for traffic management, parking monitoring, and smart city planning.
- Reduces manual monitoring efforts while increasing accuracy in vehicle counting.
- Flexible deployment from small-scale single-camera setups to large multi-camera networks for comprehensive traffic analytics.

topic: Role-Based AI Chat System with MCP
short_description: A web-based AI chat system using MCP and role-specific agents, providing tailored responses for HR and Admin tasks with session context management.
brief_description:
Description:
Developed a fully functional AI chat system leveraging MCP (Multi-Client Protocol) to create role-specific agents for HR and Admin tasks. The system manages multiple user sessions, retains conversation history, and provides secure login access.

Key Contributions:

- Built a FastAPI backend with MCP integration for real-time agent communication.
- Implemented role-specific AI agents to handle HR and Admin queries differently.
- Enabled session-based conversation history and context retention.
- Designed a robust startup and shutdown mechanism for agent resource management.
- Created a user-friendly web interface for chat interactions and login functionality.

Impact:

- Streamlines organizational workflows by providing AI-assisted responses tailored to roles.
- Reduces manual workload and improves efficiency for HR and Admin operations.
- Scalable and secure, capable of handling multiple concurrent users and roles.

topic: Invoice Processing with AI and OCR for Structured JSON Output
short_description: Automated system using AI and OCR to extract key invoice details from scanned images and convert them into structured JSON.
brief_description: Leverages AI and OCR to process scanned invoices, automatically extracting information like Vendor, Invoice Number, Date, Items, Amount, and Taxes, then converting it into a clean JSON format. This streamlines data entry for accounting/ERP systems, reducing manual effort and improving accuracy. Perfect for businesses and developers seeking intelligent document processing solutions with Python, OCR, and AI/LLM models.

topic: Tennis Player Tracking for Advanced Sports Analytics and Real-Time Performance Insights
short_description: Revolutionary tennis player tracking technology for real-time performance evaluation, strategy, and coaching insights.
brief_description: This project showcases cutting-edge tennis player tracking technology that revolutionizes sports analytics. It provides real-time tracking and data analysis of tennis players, offering features like movement tracking, shot analysis, heatmaps, and performance metrics dashboards. This data-driven approach enhances performance evaluation, strategy planning, and coaching insights, making it perfect for athletes, coaches, and sports enthusiasts aiming for a competitive advantage.

topic: Face-Following Robot in Action with Smart Tracking & AI Robotics
short_description: A smart robot that uses AI and computer vision to detect and smoothly follow human faces in real-time.
brief_description: This project showcases a robot that actively tracks and follows faces using AI-powered vision. It demonstrates real-time face detection and precise servo motor control to keep its focus on a target. This technology is perfect for robotics enthusiasts and AI developers, with potential applications in security, customer service, and interactive robots.

topic: AI Medical Chatbot: Your Virtual Health Assistant
short_description: An AI-powered medical chatbot providing instant virtual health assistance, from symptom analysis to answering health queries.
brief_description: This video explores how AI-powered medical chatbots are transforming healthcare. It demonstrates a virtual health assistant that provides instant, reliable support, from symptom checking to appointment scheduling. The chatbot uses natural language to answer health questions 24/7, improving accessibility and reducing wait times. While a powerful tool, it is not a substitute for professional medical advice.

topic: AI-Powered Object Detection and Measurement with Computer Vision
short_description: A demonstration of real-time object detection and accurate dimension measurement using AI and computer vision.
brief_description: This video explores how AI-powered object detection and measurement are transforming technology. We demonstrate how to identify objects in real-time and accurately measure their dimensions using computer vision techniques and popular tools like YOLO, TensorFlow, and OpenCV. This has powerful real-world applications in industry, robotics, and augmented reality, offering insights for developers, engineers, and tech enthusiasts.

topic: Real-Time Vehicle and License Plate Detection System
short_description: An advanced real-time vehicle and license plate detection system built with NVIDIA DeepStream for high-performance Edge AI applications.
brief_description: This project demonstrates a high-performance system for real-time vehicle tracking and license plate detection using the NVIDIA DeepStream SDK on an Edge AI device like the Jetson Orin. The system accurately identifies vehicles, reads their license plates, and tracks their movement through designated zones, making it ideal for intelligent transportation systems, automated toll collection, and security surveillance.

short_description: An intelligent 6-axis robotic arm using AI and computer vision for precise and automated pick and place tasks.
brief_description: This project showcases an advanced 6-axis pick and place robot powered by AI and computer vision. The system accurately detects, locates, and manipulates objects, demonstrating a high degree of automation. It is an ideal solution for manufacturing, logistics, and other industrial applications where efficiency and precision are critical.
